subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: F.C. New York of the United Soccer League’s First Division, one rung below Major League Soccer, was introduced Wednesday. The club will start play in 2010 at Hofstra University in Hempstead. The team’s crest includes the elements found on the flag of the Borough of Queens. The club could end up at a stadium on the site of a redeveloped Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens or perhaps in the area around Belmont Park in Elmont.
